plot: A spoof about a child with an incurable disease who wants to spend one great day with Ken - and Ken's reluctance to change his routine.
title: Last Day Foundation
plot_es: A spoof about a child with an incurable disease who wants to spend one great day with Ken - and Ken's reluctance to change his routine.
plot_en: A spoof about a child with an incurable disease who wants to spend one great day with Ken - and Ken's reluctance to change his routine.
